name: Timid
desc: In combat, this officer will attempt to avoid direct engagements if at all possible, even if commanding a combat vessel.

name: Cautious
desc: In combat, this officer will prefer to stay out of enemy range, only occasionally moving in if out-ranged by the enemy.

name: Steady
desc: In combat, this officer will favor a balanced approach with tactics matching the current situation.

name: Aggressive
desc: In combat, this officer will prefer to engage at a range that allows the use of all of their ship's weapons, will pilot civilian ships as if they were combat ships, and will employ any fighters under their command aggressively.

name: Reckless
desc: In combat, this officer is aggressive to a fault, often disregarding the safety of their ship entirely in an effort to engage the enemy.
